Drawing

Class TextEditBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • Drawing.ClickBox
      • Drawing.TextBox
        • Drawing.TextEditBox

  • public class TextEditBox
extends TextBox
    the class texteditbox enables us to let a player type his name in for instance the higscore state.
